Fayetteville.Farmington Township, Washington County,:
The Township of Farmington is one of thirty-seven townships in Washington County, Arkansas, USA. As of the 2000 census, its total population was 3605.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, Farmington Township covers an area of 4.8 square miles (12 km2); all land.


=== Cities, towns, villages ===
Farmington


=== Cemeteries ===
The township contains two cemeteries.
